00026   class ScriptManager : public Manager
00027    {
00028      DECLARE_CHAIN_CLASS(COb::ScriptManager,Manager,"scriptManager")

00031       //---------------------------------------

00038   public:
00039     Script* NewScript (const char* str = "", const char* name = 0)
00040     {
00041       Script* s = new Script;
00042       s->text = str;
00043       s->m_manager = this;
00044       s->m_id = m_scriptCounter++;
00045       if(name != 0)
00046         s->m_name = name;
00047       else
00048         s->m_name = s->m_id;
00049       int TODO; 
00050       m_scripts[s->m_id] = s;
00051 
00052       return s;
00053     }
00054     Script* NewScript (const std::string& str, const char* name = 0)
00055     {
00056       return NewScript(str.c_str(),name);
00057     }
00058     Script* NewScript (const Script* s, const char* name = 0)
00059     {
00060       return NewScript(s->text.c_str(),name);
00061     }
00062 
00063     Script* GetScript (const char* name)
00064     {
00065       std::map<unsigned int,Script* >::iterator it = m_scripts.begin();
00066       for(;it!=m_scripts.end();++it)
00067       {
00068         if(it->second->m_name == name)
00069           return it->second;
00070       }
00071       return 0;
00072     }
00073     Script* GetScript (const unsigned int id)
00074     {
00075       std::map<unsigned int,Script* >::iterator it = m_scripts.find(id);
00076       if(it != m_scripts.end())
00077         return it->second;
00078       return 0;
00079     }
00080 
00081     bool DeleteScript (Script* s)
00082     {
00083       std::map<unsigned int,Script* >::iterator it = m_scripts.find(s->m_id);
00084       if(it != m_scripts.end())
00085       {
00086         m_scripts.erase(it);
00087         delete s;
00088         return true;
00089       }
00090       return false;
00091     }
00092 
00093     bool Run (const char* str)
00094     {
00095       int s = luaL_dostring(m_luaState, str);
00096       if(s != 0)
00097         return LuaErrorCheck();
00098       return false;
00099     }
